subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Mel Stottlemyre were monitoring Roger Clemens’s new life as a Yankee, he would be concerned more with the strength in Clemens’s legs than in the arm with 348 career victories.
snippet: If Mel Stottlemyre were monitoring Roger Clemens’s new life as a Yankee, he would be concerned more with the strength in Clemens’s legs than in the arm with 348 career victories.
